#summary DataTables Editable Live Demo

= Introduction =

In this section can be found live examples of the JQuery !DataTables Editable plugin usage. Demo site contains the following examples:
 # [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/index.html Edit, select and delete records] where you can see how you can implement basic inline editing, selecting rows and deleting them.
 # [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/addingrecords.html Adding new records] where you can see how can be implemented adding new records,
 # [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/custom-editors.html Custom editors] where you can find how you can use select lists and text areas instead of the simple text box,
 # [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/inline-validation.html Validation of inline editors] where you can see how you can implement client-side validation in the inline editors,
 # [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/events.html Event handlers] where you can find how you can attach event handlers to the events,
 # [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/customization.html UI Customization] where you can see how you can customize user interface by applying jquery UI theme,
 # [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/custom-messages.html Custom message boxes] where you can see how you can replace standard message boxes with the custom ones (jAlert plugin is used in this example),
 # [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/configure-dom.html DOM configuration]  in this example you can see how you can completely configure DOM and place two tables in the same page.

You can also download an archive with the examples from a [http://code.google.com/p/jquery-datatables-editable/downloads/detail?name=JQuery-DataTables-Editable.example.1.0.0.zip Project example].
